title: Countries with the largest gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
The highest Country United States has 20724.09 more GDP in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Switzerland.
